articles.title: Coronavirus: Immunisation programmes to continue in full steam, says West Bengal govt - India Today
articles.description: The West Bengal government has asked the heads of all hospitals to ensure that immunisation programmes against vaccine-preventable diseases continue in full steam amid the Covid-19 pandemic.

articles.title: Two bookstores and a lockdown: Delhi's Midland and Mumbai's Kitab Khana on weathering the coronavirus crisis - Firstpost
articles.description: Midland and Kitab Khana have never run on glitz, but the commitment of their readers. However, in a world where intimacy itself is a risk, India’s vintage bookshops must adapt, as they are, to find ways to remain relevant and alive.
articles.content: Nobody saw this coming. The world has irrevocably changed, its ritualistic familiarity shaken so violently it may never regain an older, recognisable form. The coronavirus epidemic has dealt each facet of our life a hand that will require time, patience and p… [+5594 chars]
